notes: There are 2 palettes in LIKO-12: The Images palette which affects images only. And the Drawing palette which affects all other GPU functions.
shortDescription: Maps a color in the palette to another color.

arguments.description: The color to replace, or false for all
arguments.name: A

arguments.description: The color which will replace A
arguments.name: B

arguments.description: (0) will reset the color in the Drawing palette only, (1) will reset the color in the Images palette only, (nil/false) will reset the color in both palettes.
arguments.name: palette

arguments.description: The color to reset to it's default.
arguments.name: color

arguments.description: (0) will reset the color in the Drawing palette only, (1) will reset the color in the Images palette only, (nil/false) will reset the color in both palettes.
arguments.name: p

usages.name: Reset a specific color to it's default.
